title: Mamelodi Sundowns set for another big technical acquisition
body_text:
Mamelodi Sundowns set for another big technical acquisition
Mamelodi Sundowns look set to shake the local scene up further with the acquisition of a top PSL administrator!
Mamelodi Sundowns look set to make another major technical team acquisition.
Just days after confirming the arrival of the well-traveled Michael Loftman as a specialist ‘set-piece’ coach.
ALSO READ • Kaizer Chiefs and Mmodi situation set for another TWIST!
Rhulani Mokwena’s side are tipped to poach of the PSL’s top administrators!
According to reports, PSL head of competitions Thami Khuzwayo will join Mamelodi Sundowns as an ‘assistant team manager or assistant team liaison manager’.
ALSO READ • European star seeks Kaizer Chiefs, Pirates or Downs move
Khuzwayo is expected to act as a deputy to both Kagiso Marumo and Peter Ndlovu at the Brazilians.
PSL administrator to join Mamelodi Sundowns?
ALSO READ • Former Orlando Pirates star set to join Soweto rivals!
“Sundowns look set to make a surprise appointment with a new addition to their already bloated technical team.” a FarPost report read.
“Thami Khuzwayo is set to join Mamelodi Sundowns in what could be an assistant team manager or assistant team liaison manager role.
“Thami is joining Sundowns as an assistant manager. He’ll assist Peter [team manager] and Kagiso [the team liaison manager].” a source told the publication.
ALSO READ • Kaizer Chiefs to extend star man’s contract by another season
Loftman joins the Brazilians
“Mamelodi Sundowns has bolstered its Technical Team and football-department with the appointment of Michael Loftman as Set Play Coach.” a club statement read.
“The appointment was made in an effort to raise the bar including a specialist to the Technical Team. All elite sport is about gaining small margins.
ALSO READ • Kaizer Chiefs could sign these TWO strikers from rivals for FREE
“Replays and restarts are a significant part of modern-day football and are even more crucial when playing in the CAF Champions League.
“Loftman has held various coaching roles as head coach and development coach. He holds a UEFA A license from the English FA and a Sports Science & Coaching Masters Degree from Brunel University.
“In his role, the experienced coach and performance data analyst will work on the pitch for Mamelodi Sundowns. And also compile analytic data to provide information to improve an important part of the game.”
